instructions: # Metamorphosis Alpha 1e Character Sheet This sheet has both a Human and Mutant sheet and a Monster Sheet for the Judge that is switchable via a tab at the top left of the sheet.## Player Sheets* All of the roll buttons (shown as a d20 dice) have roll templates.* Attack rolls show the AC hit## Monster Sheet* All of the roll buttons have roll templates and many of them go to the GM* In sheet ability to create non-player creature mutations## Current Version: 1.0
